Question: Teledyne LeCroy CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Teledyne LeCroy

WaveAce 2024 Digital Oscilloscope

- 4 analog + ext channel(s)
- 200 MHz analog bandwidth
- 2 GSa/s sampling rate
- 24 kpts memory depth
- Long capture for more waveform detail
- Math and measure functions, including FFT and 32 automatic measurement parameters
- USB and LAN connectivity
- Pass/Fail Testing for identifying failing devices
- Large internal storage for saving waveforms and setups
- Waveform sequence recorder for recording and playing back up to 2500 waveforms
